title: [Fired Up, Potter's Corner]
description: A clay-spattered stool sits in front of a potter's wheel, an earthware jug filled with water and a bin of discarded, misshapen clay pieces to one side.  A workbench lined with sculpted pieces ready for firing sits beneath a small, round window covered with a tattered canvas tarp.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
